textBox.richText: The Lyonses hit Dresden during Euro 2008

Euro 2008 is upon us, and Germany are doing pretty well. Let’s not mention England - cough. Abby and Dave came to visit with their scooter racing tots in tow, and we hung out with Dave’s brother Keith and his wife Martina, and Grandma Lyons and Gwen (Keith also lives here in Dresden, after coming back from China to be with the wife and kid. I met them all first when we all lived in Rochester MN, and played in bands). One evening we were in the park with the kids while a game was on, and it was all very quiet, not a soul in sight... all watching the game on TV. Well, quiet until germany scored, then a very odd sound made us all jump. Several thousand people indoors making the same cheering noise at the exact same time makes for unusually startling listening outside.
